name: 2.07. Special Attacks
content:

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.u7ymeeQewjTXVrlW]{2.07. Special Attacks}

  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.vuTQH6gykORoSCUE]{2.07.1. Aid Another}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.o0Ufwyu65bmusBhM]{2.07.2. Charge}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.CK4ZYweM6IifrrV0]{2.07.3. Combat Maneuvers}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.QrPAIYOFsZBHKHvt]{2.07.4. Feint}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.uR2lQHLIAn5HhlfT]{2.07.5. Mounted Combat}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.KrSwE6n4UyxJfYPB]{2.07.6. Throw Splash Weapon}
  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.jLQbe8GmyB470OIJ]{2.07.7. Two-Weapon Fighting}

 

Source PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 197

This section discusses all of the various standard maneuvers you can perform during combat other than normal attacks, casting spells, or using other class abilities. Some of these special attacks can be made as part of another action (such as an attack) or as a attack of opportunity.
